Package org.opendaylight.controller.netconf.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NetconfExiSession
    Session capable of exi communication according to http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-varga-netconf-exi-capability-02
    NetconfSession  
    NetconfSessionListener<S extends NetconfSession>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NetconfClientSessionPreferences
    The only input for the start of a NETCONF session is hello-message.
    NetconfDocumentedExceptionTest
    Unit tests for NetconfDocumentedException.
    NetconfMessage
    NetconfMessage represents a wrapper around org.w3c.dom.Document.
    NetconfServerSessionPreferences
    The only input for the start of a NETCONF session is hello-message.
    NetconfSessionPreferences  
    NetconfTerminationReason  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NetconfDocumentedException.ErrorSeverity  
    NetconfDocumentedException.ErrorTag  
    NetconfDocumentedException.ErrorType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NetconfDeserializerException
    This exception is thrown by NetconfSessionListener#onMessage(NetconfMessage) to indicate fatal communication problem after which the session should be closed.
    NetconfDocumentedException
    Checked exception to communicate an error that needs to be sent to the netconf client.
